summary: Provides a complete mock implementation of the Amazon Relational Database Service (RDS), including custom error handling, a backend that simulates the lifecycle and configuration of databases, clusters, snapshots, parameter groups, security groups, and proxies, as well as request parsing and response generation for the RDS API.
business_intent: Allows developers to test and develop applications that interact with AWS RDS locally without contacting the real service, ensuring functional correctness, handling of edge cases, and compliance with RDS API contracts.
